description: Try our easy to follow Lamb & Mint Sausage Rolls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lamb & Mint Sausage Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup tomato sauce (or relish, to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 210Â°C. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Combine mince, breadcrumbs, onion, carrot, mint, sauce and half of the egg in a bowl. Season with salt flakes and pepper and mix well. Divide mince mixture into 6 equal portions and roll into a sausage shape the same length as the pastry.

Place pastry sheets on a clean work surface. Cut in half. Place one portion of mince along one edge. Brush other edge with remaining egg. Roll pastry and mince over and press to seal. Cut each roll in half, or into smaller rolls, as desired. Brush tops with egg and place on trays. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until puffed and golden. Serve with tomato sauce or relish.
